mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (name, pwd, email, Retime, state, rid, logId) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{retime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Retime = #{retime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rid = #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, logId = #{logid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, pwd, email, Retime, state, rid, logId from user
